item.description:
I am a graduate in electrical engineering from Concordia University. I have studied in various subfields of electrical engineering such as electronics, digital systems design (VHDL), power electronics, digital signal processing, computer architecture, antennas, etc. I also have experience in programmimg languages such as C++, Java, HTML, etc.

I am a person who loves to learn and improve myself in all aspects. I love helping others and sharing my knowledge.
